generated_body: In this article, the reader may expect to learn about the strategic reasons behind McDonald's decision to keep the Filet-O-Fish on its menu, despite it being less popular than other items. Additionally, the article might explore the marketing strategies that highlight this product and its significance in appealing to a broader demographic, including those who seek meatless options.
